regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige Una opcion', ['Opcion 1','Opcion 2', 'Opcion 3']) lists = ['$doregex[geturl2]|Referer=https://planetfastidious.net&Origin=https://planetfastidious.net&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36','$doregex[geturl5]|Referer=https://planetfastidious.net&Origin=https://planetfastidious.net&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36','$doregex[geturl4]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0&Origin=https://hoca2.com&Referer=https://hoca2.com/'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: select_Url
regex.expres: $pyFunction: '$doregex[geturl]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0&Origin=https://vodkapr3mium.com&Referer=https://vodkapr3mium.com/' if not '$doregex[geturl]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0&Origin=https://vodkapr3mium.com&Referer=https://vodkapr3mium.com/'=='' else 'https://ia601309.us.archive.org/4/items/20240222125627165/20240222125627165.mp4|User-Agent=iPhone'

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige una opcion: ', ['SOCCER','NBA','MLB']) lists = ['soccerstreams','nbastreams','mlbstreams'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: play
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

regex.name: groups
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction
def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m): import requests import re results = list() data = requests.get( "https://dlhd.so/schedule/schedule-generated.json").json()
for day, dayEvents in data.items(): results.append( (f"[COLOR white]•[/COLOR] [COLOR orange]{day.split(' - ')[0] if ' - ' in day else day}[/COLOR]", "None")) for competition, competitionEvents in dayEvents.items(): results.append( (f" [COLOR white]•[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]{competition}[/COLOR]", "None")) for competitionEvent in competitionEvents: event = ( f" [COLOR white]•[/COLOR] [COLOR orange]{competitionEvent['time']} {competitionEvent['event']} [/COLOR]", "None") if len(competitionEvent["channels"]) > 1: results.extend([( f" [COLOR white]{link['channel_name']}[/COLOR]", link['channel_id']) for link in competitionEvent["channels"]]) else: event = list(event) event[1] = competitionEvent["channels"][0]["channel_id"] results.append(tuple(event))
return results

regex.name: play
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m): import requests import re import urllib.parse HOST = "https://dlhd.so/" url = "https://dlhd.so/stream/stream-[groups.param2].php" USER_AGENT = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:98.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/98.0" data = requests.post( url, headers={ 'Referer': HOST, 'User-Agent': USER_AGENT, }).text iframe = re.compile('iframe src="(.*?)"').findall(data)[0] iframeData = requests.get( iframe, headers={ 'Referer': url, 'User-Agent': USER_AGENT, }).text
link = re.search(r"source:\s*'([^']+)'", iframeData).group(1)
parsed_url = urllib.parse.urlparse(iframe) referer_base = f"{parsed_url.scheme}://{parsed_url.netloc}" referer = urllib.parse.quote_plus(referer_base) user_agent = urllib.parse.quote_plus(USER_AGENT)
return f'{link}|Referer={referer}/&Origin={referer}&Keep-Alive=true&User-Agent={user_agent}'
